column4: anyone know what to do to make an ubuntu install iso bootable when copied to a partition?
I think if you follow the same instructions for copying an ISO to a USB flash drive it should work on a standard HDD
any idea how to copy the iso to a usb under mac os x?  none of the soluitons posted on the community wiki's apply to osx
I think you'll need to extract it, StuffIt Expander should have that capability, then just copy them like any other files
